name: Godot Engine 3 StreamTexture File
summary: Learn about .STEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can create STEX files by dragging and dropping an image, typically a .PNG file, into the project assets in Godot Engine. Godot Engine then copies the image file and appends the .stex file extension onto the existing file extension.

instructions: You should not attempt to open STEX files. Instead, Godot Engine 3 references the STEX assets to apply textures to objects in the game.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
